enums.name: ImageScale::Fill
enums.description:
Scale each dimension to exactly fit destination, the aspect ratio of the
image is no preserved.

enums.name: ImageScale::Down
enums.description:
If it is too large for the destination, scale the image down while
preserving the aspect ratio.

enums.name: ImageScale::UpOrDown
enums.description:
Scale the image to its maximum possible dimensions while both staying
within the destination area and preserving its aspect ratio.
